name: No Chicken Out
description:
Run (Left/Right-Arrow), Multi-Jump (UP-Arrow), and Push (Spacebar) your enemies into the lava.

The more damage someone has the easier they are to push.

Best played with a controller and in Fullscreen!

Devlog: Probably finished when the voting ends

Made in Godot

Art Kit by Kenney: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Lava Sound by Audionautics: https://freesound.org/people/Audionautics/sounds/133901/

RMSmartShape2D (used for terrain) by Robert Morse: https://github.com/SirRamEsq/rmsmartshape2d

Let me know what you think and criticise as much as you want. Feedback is very welcome
